00022 HypreParVector::HypreParVector(int glob_size, int *col) : Vector()
00023 {
00024    x = hypre_ParVectorCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD,glob_size,col);
00025    hypre_ParVectorInitialize(x);
00026    hypre_ParVectorSetPartitioningOwner(x,0);
00027    // The data will be destroyed by hypre (this is the default)
00028    hypre_ParVectorSetDataOwner(x,1);
00029    hypre_SeqVectorSetDataOwner(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x),1);
00030    SetDataAndSize(hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)),
00031                   hypre_VectorSize(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)));
00032    own_ParVector = 1;
00033 }
00034 
00035 HypreParVector::HypreParVector(int glob_size, double *_data, int *col)
00036    : Vector()
00037 {
00038    x = hypre_ParVectorCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD,glob_size,col);
00039    hypre_ParVectorSetDataOwner(x,1); // owns the seq vector
00040    hypre_SeqVectorSetDataOwner(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x),0);
00041    hypre_ParVectorSetPartitioningOwner(x,0);
00042    hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)) = _data;
00043    // If hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x) is non-NULL, hypre_ParVectorInitialize(x)
00044    // does not allocate memory!
00045    hypre_ParVectorInitialize(x);
00046    SetDataAndSize(hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)),
00047                   hypre_VectorSize(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)));
00048    own_ParVector = 1;
00049 }
00050 
00051 HypreParVector::HypreParVector(const HypreParVector &y) : Vector()
00052 {
00053    x = hypre_ParVectorCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD, y.x -> global_size,
00054                              y.x -> partitioning);
00055    hypre_ParVectorInitialize(x);
00056    hypre_ParVectorSetPartitioningOwner(x,0);
00057    hypre_ParVectorSetDataOwner(x,1);
00058    hypre_SeqVectorSetDataOwner(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x),1);
00059    SetDataAndSize(hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)),
00060                   hypre_VectorSize(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)));
00061    own_ParVector = 1;
00062 }
00063 
00064 HypreParVector::HypreParVector(HYPRE_ParVector y) : Vector()
00065 {
00066    x = (hypre_ParVector *) y;
00067    SetDataAndSize(hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)),
00068                   hypre_VectorSize(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)));
00069    own_ParVector = 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 HypreParVector::operator hypre_ParVector*() const
00073 {
00074    return x;
00075 }
00076 
00077 HypreParVector::operator HYPRE_ParVector() const
00078 {
00079    return (HYPRE_ParVector) x;
00080 }
00081 
00082 Vector * HypreParVector::GlobalVector()
00083 {
00084    hypre_Vector *hv = hypre_ParVectorToVectorAll(*this);
00085    Vector *v = new Vector(hv->data, hv->size);
00086    v->MakeDataOwner();
00087    hypre_SeqVectorSetDataOwner(hv,0);
00088    hypre_SeqVectorDestroy(hv);
00089    return v;
00090 }
00091 
00092 HypreParVector& HypreParVector::operator=(double d)
00093 {
00094    hypre_ParVectorSetConstantValues(x,d);
00095    return *this;
00096 }
00097 
00098 HypreParVector& HypreParVector::operator=(const HypreParVector &y)
00099 {
00100 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00101    if (size != y.Size())
00102       cerr << "HypreParVector::operator=" << endl;
00103 #endif
00104 
00105    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00106       data[i] = y.data[i];
00107    return *this;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void HypreParVector::SetData(double *_data)
00111 {
00112    Vector::data = hypre_VectorData(hypre_ParVectorLocalVector(x)) = _data;
00113 }
00114 
00115 int HypreParVector::Randomize(int seed)
00116 {
00117    return hypre_ParVectorSetRandomValues(x,seed);
00118 }

00120 void HypreParVector::Print(const char *fname)
00121 {
00122    hypre_ParVectorPrint(x,fname);
00123 }

00125 HypreParVector::~HypreParVector()
00126 {
00127    if (own_ParVector)
00128       hypre_ParVectorDestroy(x);
00129 }

00134    return hypre_ParVectorInnerProd(*x, *y);

00143 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(int size, int *row, SparseMatrix *diag)
00144    : Operator(size)
00145 {
00146    A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD, size, size, row, row,
00147                                 0, diag->NumNonZeroElems(), 0);
00148    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A,0);
00149    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(A,0);
00150    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(A,0);
00151 
00152    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->diag,0);
00153    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->diag)    = diag->GetI();
00154    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->diag)    = diag->GetJ();
00155    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag) = diag->GetData();
00156    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->diag);
00157 
00158    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->offd,1);
00159    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->offd)    = new int[diag->Size()+1];
00160    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->offd)    = NULL;
00161    for (int k = 0; k < diag->Size()+1; k++)
00162       (A->offd)->i[k] = 0;
00163 
00164    /* Don't need to call these, since they allocate memory only
00165       if it was not already allocated */
00166    // hypre_CSRMatrixInitialize(A->diag);
00167    // hypre_ParCSRMatrixInitialize(A);
00168 
00169    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00170 
00171    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00172 
00173    CommPkg = NULL;
00174    X = Y = NULL;
00175 }
00176

00178 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col,
00179                                SparseMatrix *diag)
00180 {
00181    A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD, M, N, row, col,
00182                                 0, diag->NumNonZeroElems(), 0);
00183    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A,0);
00184    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(A,0);
00185    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(A,0);
00186 
00187    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->diag,0);
00188    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->diag)    = diag->GetI();
00189    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->diag)    = diag->GetJ();
00190    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag) = diag->GetData();
00191    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->diag);
00192 
00193    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->offd,1);
00194    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->offd) = new int[diag->Size()+1];
00195    for (int k = 0; k < diag->Size()+1; k++) (A->offd)->i[k] = 0;
00196 
00197    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00198 
00199    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00200 
00201    CommPkg = NULL;
00202    X = Y = NULL;
00203 
00204    size = GetNumRows();
00205 }

00207 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col,
00208                                SparseMatrix *diag, SparseMatrix *offd,
00209                                int *cmap)
00210 {
00211    A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD, M, N, row, col,
00212                                 offd->Width(), diag->NumNonZeroElems(),
00213                                 offd->NumNonZeroElems());
00214    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A,0);
00215    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(A,0);
00216    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(A,0);
00217 
00218    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->diag,0);
00219    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->diag)    = diag->GetI();
00220    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->diag)    = diag->GetJ();
00221    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag) = diag->GetData();
00222    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->diag);
00223 
00224    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->offd,0);
00225    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->offd)    = offd->GetI();
00226    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->offd)    = offd->GetJ();
00227    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->offd) = offd->GetData();
00228    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->offd);
00229 
00230    hypre_ParCSRMatrixColMapOffd(A) = cmap;
00231 
00232    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00233 
00234    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00235 
00236    CommPkg = NULL;
00237    X = Y = NULL;
00238 
00239    size = GetNumRows();
00240 }
00241 
00242 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(int *row, int *col, SparseMatrix *sm_a)
00243 {
00244 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00245    if (sm_a == NULL)
00246       mfem_error("HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix: sm_a==NULL");
00247 #endif
00248 
00249    hypre_CSRMatrix *csr_a;
00250 
00251    csr_a = hypre_CSRMatrixCreate(sm_a -> Size(), sm_a -> Width(),
00252                                  sm_a -> NumNonZeroElems());
00253 
00254    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(csr_a,0);
00255    hypre_CSRMatrixI(csr_a)    = sm_a -> GetI();
00256    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(csr_a)    = sm_a -> GetJ();
00257    hypre_CSRMatrixData(csr_a) = sm_a -> GetData();
00258    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(csr_a);
00259 
00260    A = hypre_CSRMatrixToParCSRMatrix(MPI_COMM_WORLD,csr_a,row,col);
00261 
00262    CommPkg = NULL;
00263    X = Y = NULL;
00264 
00265    size = GetNumRows();
00266 
00267    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00268 }
00269 
00270 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col,
00271                                Table *diag)
00272 {
00273    int nnz = diag->Size_of_connections();
00274    A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(MPI_COMM_WORLD, M, N, row, col,
00275                                 0, nnz, 0);
00276    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A,1);
00277    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(A,0);
00278    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(A,0);
00279 
00280    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->diag,1);
00281    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->diag)    = diag->GetI();
00282    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->diag)    = diag->GetJ();
00283 
00284    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag) = new double[nnz];
00285    for (int k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00286       (hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag))[k] = 1.0;
00287 
00288    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->diag);
00289 
00290    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->offd,1);
00291    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->offd) = new int[diag->Size()+1];
00292    for (int k = 0; k < diag->Size()+1; k++) (A->offd)->i[k] = 0;
00293 
00294    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00295 
00296    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00297 
00298    CommPkg = NULL;
00299    X = Y = NULL;
00300 
00301    size = GetNumRows();
00302 }
00303 
00304 HypreParMatrix::HypreParMatrix(MPI_Comm comm, int id, int np,
00305                                int *row, int *col,
00306                                int *i_diag, int *j_diag,
00307                                int *i_offd, int *j_offd,
00308                                int *cmap, int cmap_size)
00309 {
00310    int diag_col, offd_col;
00311 
00312    if (HYPRE_AssumedPartitionCheck())
00313    {
00314       diag_col = i_diag[row[1]-row[0]];
00315       offd_col = i_offd[row[1]-row[0]];
00316 
00317       A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(comm, row[2], col[2], row, col,
00318                                    cmap_size, diag_col, offd_col);
00319    }
00320    else
00321    {
00322       diag_col = i_diag[row[id+1]-row[id]];
00323       offd_col = i_offd[row[id+1]-row[id]];
00324 
00325       A = hypre_ParCSRMatrixCreate(comm, row[np], col[np], row, col,
00326                                    cmap_size, diag_col, offd_col);
00327    }
00328 
00329    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A,1);
00330    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(A,0);
00331    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(A,0);
00332 
00333    int i;
00334 
00335    double * a_diag = new double[diag_col];
00336    for (i = 0; i < diag_col; i++)
00337       a_diag[i] = 1.0;
00338 
00339    double * a_offd = new double[offd_col];
00340    for (i = 0; i < offd_col; i++)
00341       a_offd[i] = 1.0;
00342 
00343    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->diag,1);
00344    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->diag)    = i_diag;
00345    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->diag)    = j_diag;
00346    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->diag) = a_diag;
00347    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->diag);
00348 
00349    hypre_CSRMatrixSetDataOwner(A->offd,1);
00350    hypre_CSRMatrixI(A->offd)    = i_offd;
00351    hypre_CSRMatrixJ(A->offd)    = j_offd;
00352    hypre_CSRMatrixData(A->offd) = a_offd;
00353    hypre_CSRMatrixSetRownnz(A->offd);
00354 
00355    hypre_ParCSRMatrixColMapOffd(A) = cmap;
00356 
00357    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00358 
00359    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00360 
00361    CommPkg = NULL;
00362    X = Y = NULL;
00363 
00364    size = GetNumRows();
00365 }
00366 
00367 void HypreParMatrix::SetCommPkg(hypre_ParCSRCommPkg *comm_pkg)
00368 {
00369    CommPkg = comm_pkg;
00370 
00371    if (hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A))
00372       hypre_MatvecCommPkgDestroy(hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A));
00373 
00374    hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A) = comm_pkg;
00375 }
00376 
00377 void HypreParMatrix::CheckCommPkg()
00378 {
00379 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00380    if (CommPkg == NULL || CommPkg != hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A))
00381       cerr << endl << "HypreParMatrix::CheckCommPkg()" << endl;
00382 #endif
00383 }
00384 
00385 void HypreParMatrix::DestroyCommPkg()
00386 {
00387    if (CommPkg == NULL)
00388       return;
00389    hypre_TFree(CommPkg->send_procs);
00390    hypre_TFree(CommPkg->send_map_starts);
00391    hypre_TFree(CommPkg->send_map_elmts);
00392    hypre_TFree(CommPkg->recv_procs);
00393    hypre_TFree(CommPkg->recv_vec_starts);
00394    if (CommPkg->send_mpi_types)
00395       hypre_TFree(CommPkg->send_mpi_types);
00396    if (CommPkg->recv_mpi_types)
00397       hypre_TFree(CommPkg->recv_mpi_types);
00398    if (hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A) == CommPkg)
00399       hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A) = NULL;
00400    delete CommPkg;
00401    CommPkg = NULL;
00402 }

00414 hypre_ParCSRMatrix* HypreParMatrix::StealData()
00415 {
00416    hypre_ParCSRMatrix *R = A;
00417    A = NULL;
00418    return R;
00419 }

00421 HypreParMatrix * HypreParMatrix::Transpose()
00422 {
00423    hypre_ParCSRMatrix * At;
00424    hypre_ParCSRMatrixTranspose(A, &At, 1);
00425    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(At);
00426 
00427    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(At);
00428 
00429    return new HypreParMatrix(At);
00430 }

00432 int HypreParMatrix::Mult(HypreParVector &x, HypreParVector &y,
00433                          double a, double b)
00434 {
00435    return hypre_ParCSRMatrixMatvec(a, A, x, b, y);
00436 }
00437 
00438 void HypreParMatrix::Mult(const Vector &x, Vector &y) const
00439 {
00440    if (X == NULL)
00441    {
00442       X = new HypreParVector(GetGlobalNumCols(),
00443                              x.GetData(),
00444                              GetColStarts());
00445       Y = new HypreParVector(GetGlobalNumRows(),
00446                              y.GetData(),
00447                              GetRowStarts());
00448    }
00449    else
00450    {
00451       X -> SetData(x.GetData());
00452       Y -> SetData(y.GetData());
00453    }
00454 
00455    hypre_ParCSRMatrixMatvec(1.0, A, *X, 0.0, *Y);
00456 }
00457 
00458 void HypreParMatrix::MultTranspose(const Vector &x, Vector &y) const
00459 {
00460    if (X == NULL)
00461    {
00462       X = new HypreParVector(GetGlobalNumCols(),
00463                              x.GetData(),
00464                              GetColStarts());
00465       Y = new HypreParVector(GetGlobalNumRows(),
00466                              y.GetData(),
00467                              GetRowStarts());
00468    }
00469    else
00470    {
00471       X -> SetData(x.GetData());
00472       Y -> SetData(y.GetData());
00473    }
00474 
00475    hypre_ParCSRMatrixMatvecT(1.0, A, *X, 0.0, *Y);
00476 }

00478 int HypreParMatrix::Mult(HYPRE_ParVector x, HYPRE_ParVector y,
00479                          double a, double b)
00480 {
00481    return hypre_ParCSRMatrixMatvec(a,A,(hypre_ParVector *)x,b,(hypre_ParVector *)y);
00482 }

00484 int HypreParMatrix::MultTranspose(HypreParVector & x, HypreParVector & y,
00485                                   double a, double b)

00487    return hypre_ParCSRMatrixMatvecT(a,A,x,b,y);

00490 void HypreParMatrix::Print(const char *fname, int offi, int offj)
00491 {
00492    hypre_ParCSRMatrixPrintIJ(A,offi,offj,fname);
00493 }
00494 
00495 void HypreParMatrix::Read(const char *fname)
00496 {
00497    if (A) hypre_ParCSRMatrixDestroy(A);
00498    int io,jo;
00499    hypre_ParCSRMatrixReadIJ(MPI_COMM_WORLD, fname, &io, &jo, &A);
00500    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(A);
00501 
00502    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(A);
00503 }
00504 
00505 HypreParMatrix::~HypreParMatrix()
00506 {
00507    DestroyCommPkg();
00508 
00509    if (A)
00510    {
00511       if (hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A))
00512          hypre_MatvecCommPkgDestroy(hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A));
00513       hypre_ParCSRMatrixCommPkg(A) = NULL;
00514 
00515       if (hypre_CSRMatrixOwnsData(A->diag))
00516       {
00517          hypre_CSRMatrixDestroy(A->diag);
00518          A->diag = NULL;
00519       }
00520       else
00521       {
00522          hypre_TFree(A->diag);
00523          A->diag = NULL;
00524       }
00525 
00526       if (hypre_CSRMatrixOwnsData(A->offd))
00527       {
00528          hypre_CSRMatrixDestroy(A->offd);
00529          A->offd = NULL;
00530       }
00531       hypre_ParCSRMatrixDestroy(A);
00532    }
00533 
00534    delete X;
00535    delete Y;
00536 }
00537 
00538 HypreParMatrix * ParMult(HypreParMatrix *A, HypreParMatrix *B)
00539 {
00540    hypre_ParCSRMatrix * ab;
00541    ab = hypre_ParMatmul(*A,*B);
00542 
00543    hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(ab);
00544 
00545    return new HypreParMatrix(ab);
00546 }
00547 
00548 HypreParMatrix * RAP(HypreParMatrix *A, HypreParMatrix *P)
00549 {
00550    int P_owns_its_col_starts =
00551       hypre_ParCSRMatrixOwnsColStarts((hypre_ParCSRMatrix*)(*P));
00552    hypre_ParCSRMatrix * rap;
00553    hypre_BoomerAMGBuildCoarseOperator(*P,*A,*P,&rap);
00554 
00555    hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetNumNonzeros(rap);
00556    // hypre_MatvecCommPkgCreate(rap);
00557    if (!P_owns_its_col_starts)
00558    {
00559       /* Warning: hypre_BoomerAMGBuildCoarseOperator steals the col_starts
00560          from P (even if it does not own them)! */
00561       hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetRowStartsOwner(rap,0);
00562       hypre_ParCSRMatrixSetColStartsOwner(rap,0);
00563    }
00564    return new HypreParMatrix(rap);
00565 }

00567 
00568 HypreSolver::HypreSolver()
00569 {
00570    size = 0;
00571 
00572    A = NULL;
00573    setup_called = 0;
00574    B = X = NULL;
00575 }
00576 
00577 HypreSolver::HypreSolver(HypreParMatrix *_A)
00578 {
00579    size = _A -> GetNumRows();
00580 
00581    A = _A;
00582    setup_called = 0;
00583    B = X = NULL;
00584 }
00585 
00586 void HypreSolver::Mult(const HypreParVector &b, HypreParVector &x) const
00587 {
00588    if (A == NULL)
00589    {
00590       cerr << "HypreSolver::Mult (...) : HypreParMatrix A is missing" << endl;
00591       return;
00592    }
00593    if (!setup_called)
00594    {
00595       SetupFcn()(*this, *A, b, x);
00596       setup_called = 1;
00597    }
00598 
00599    SolveFcn()(*this, *A, b, x);
00600 }
00601 
00602 void HypreSolver::Mult(const Vector &b, Vector &x) const
00603 {
00604    if (A == NULL)
00605    {
00606       cerr << "HypreSolver::Mult (...) : HypreParMatrix A is missing" << endl;
00607       return;
00608    }
00609    if (B == NULL)
00610    {
00611       B = new HypreParVector(A -> GetGlobalNumRows(),
00612                              b.GetData(),
00613                              A -> GetRowStarts());
00614       X = new HypreParVector(A -> GetGlobalNumCols(),
00615                              x.GetData(),
00616                              A -> GetColStarts());
00617    }
00618    else
00619    {
00620       B -> SetData(b.GetData());
00621       X -> SetData(x.GetData());
00622    }
00623 
00624    Mult(*B, *X);
00625 }
00626 
00627 HypreSolver::~HypreSolver()
00628 {
00629    if (B) delete B;
00630    if (X) delete X;
00631 }
00632

00639    use_zero_initial_iterate = 0;
00640 
00641    HYPRE_ParCSRMatrixGetComm(*A, &comm);
00642 
00643    HYPRE_ParCSRPCGCreate(comm, &pcg_solver);
00644 }

00674 
00675 void HyprePCG::Mult(const HypreParVector &b, HypreParVector &x) const
00676 {
00677    int myid;
00678    int time_index;
00679    int num_iterations;
00680    double final_res_norm;
00681    MPI_Comm comm;
00682 
00683    HYPRE_ParCSRMatrixGetComm(*A, &comm);
00684 
00685    if (!setup_called)
00686    {
00687       HYPRE_ParCSRPCGSetup(pcg_solver, *A, b, x);
00688       setup_called = 1;
00689    }
00690 
00691    if (print_level > 0)
00692    {
00693       time_index = hypre_InitializeTiming("PCG Solve");
00694       hypre_BeginTiming(time_index);
00695    }
00696 
00697    if (use_zero_initial_iterate)
00698       x = 0.0;
00699 
00700    HYPRE_ParCSRPCGSolve(pcg_solver, *A, b, x);
00701 
00702    if (print_level > 0)
00703    {
00704       hypre_EndTiming(time_index);
00705       hypre_PrintTiming("Solve phase times", comm);
00706       hypre_FinalizeTiming(time_index);
00707       hypre_ClearTiming();
00708 
00709       HYPRE_ParCSRPCGGetNumIterations(pcg_solver, &num_iterations);
00710       HYPRE_ParCSRPCGGetFinalRelativeResidualNorm(pcg_solver,
00711                                                   &final_res_norm);
00712 
00713       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myid);
00714 
00715       if (myid == 0)
00716       {
00717          cout << "PCG Iterations = " << num_iterations << endl
00718               << "Final PCG Relative Residual Norm = " << final_res_norm
00719               << endl;
00720       }
00721    }
00722 }
00723 
00724 HyprePCG::~HyprePCG()
00725 {
00726    HYPRE_ParCSRPCGDestroy(pcg_solver);
00727 }

00783 void HypreGMRES::Mult(const HypreParVector &b, HypreParVector &x) const
00784 {
00785    int myid;
00786    int time_index;
00787    int num_iterations;
00788    double final_res_norm;
00789    MPI_Comm comm;
00790 
00791    HYPRE_ParCSRMatrixGetComm(*A, &comm);
00792 
00793    if (!setup_called)
00794    {
00795       HYPRE_ParCSRGMRESSetup(gmres_solver, *A, b, x);
00796       setup_called = 1;
00797    }
00798 
00799    if (print_level > 0)
00800    {
00801       time_index = hypre_InitializeTiming("GMRES Solve");
00802       hypre_BeginTiming(time_index);
00803    }
00804 
00805    if (use_zero_initial_iterate)
00806       x = 0.0;
00807 
00808    HYPRE_ParCSRGMRESSolve(gmres_solver, *A, b, x);
00809 
00810    if (print_level > 0)
00811    {
00812       hypre_EndTiming(time_index);
00813       hypre_PrintTiming("Solve phase times", comm);
00814       hypre_FinalizeTiming(time_index);
00815       hypre_ClearTiming();
00816 
00817       HYPRE_ParCSRGMRESGetNumIterations(gmres_solver, &num_iterations);
00818       HYPRE_ParCSRGMRESGetFinalRelativeResidualNorm(gmres_solver,
00819                                                     &final_res_norm);
00820 
00821       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myid);
00822 
00823       if (myid == 0)
00824       {
00825          cout << "GMRES Iterations = " << num_iterations << endl
00826               << "Final GMRES Relative Residual Norm = " << final_res_norm
00827               << endl;
00828       }
00829    }
00830 }

00844    double sai_filter     = 0.1;
00845    int    sai_sym        = 0;

00848    int    sai_logging    = 1;

00853    HYPRE_ParaSailsSetParams(sai_precond, sai_threshold, sai_max_levels);
00854    HYPRE_ParaSailsSetFilter(sai_precond, sai_filter);
00855    HYPRE_ParaSailsSetSym(sai_precond, sai_sym);

00872 HypreBoomerAMG::HypreBoomerAMG(HypreParMatrix &A) : HypreSolver(&A)
00873 {
00874    int coarsen_type = 10;
00875    int agg_levels   = 1;
00876    int relax_type   = 8;
00877    int relax_sweeps = 1;
00878    double theta     = 0.25;
00879    int interp_type  = 6;
00880    int Pmax         = 4;
00881    int print_level  = 1;
00882 
00883    HYPRE_BoomerAMGCreate(&amg_precond);
00884 
00885    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetCoarsenType(amg_precond, coarsen_type);
00886    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetAggNumLevels(amg_precond, agg_levels);
00887    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetRelaxType(amg_precond, relax_type);
00888    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetNumSweeps(amg_precond, relax_sweeps);
00889    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetMaxLevels(amg_precond, 25);
00890    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetTol(amg_precond, 0.0);
00891    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetMaxIter(amg_precond, 1); // one V-cycle
00892    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetStrongThreshold(amg_precond, theta);
00893    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetInterpType(amg_precond, interp_type);
00894    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetPMaxElmts(amg_precond, Pmax);
00895    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetPrintLevel(amg_precond, print_level);
00896 }
00897 
00898 void HypreBoomerAMG::SetSystemsOptions(int dim)
00899 {
00900    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetNumFunctions(amg_precond, dim);
00901 
00902    // More robust options with respect to convergence
00903    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetAggNumLevels(amg_precond, 0);
00904    HYPRE_BoomerAMGSetStrongThreshold(amg_precond, 0.5);
00905 }

00907 HypreBoomerAMG::~HypreBoomerAMG()
00908 {
00909    HYPRE_BoomerAMGDestroy(amg_precond);
00910 }

00913 #include "../fem/fem.hpp"
00914 
00915 HypreAMS::HypreAMS(HypreParMatrix &A, ParFiniteElementSpace *edge_fespace)
00916    : HypreSolver(&A)
00917 {
00918    int cycle_type       = 13;
00919    int rlx_type         = 2;
00920    int rlx_sweeps       = 1;
00921    double rlx_weight    = 1.0;
00922    double rlx_omega     = 1.0;
00923    int amg_coarsen_type = 10;
00924    int amg_agg_levels   = 1;
00925    int amg_agg_npaths   = 1;
00926    int amg_rlx_type     = 8;
00927    double theta         = 0.25;
00928    int amg_interp_type  = 6;
00929    int amg_Pmax         = 4;
00930    int print_level      = 1;
00931 
00932    HYPRE_AMSCreate(&ams);
00933 
00934    HYPRE_AMSSetDimension(ams, 3); // 3D problems
00935    HYPRE_AMSSetTol(ams, 0.0);
00936    HYPRE_AMSSetMaxIter(ams, 1); // use as a preconditioner
00937    HYPRE_AMSSetCycleType(ams, cycle_type);
00938    HYPRE_AMSSetPrintLevel(ams, 1);
00939 
00941    ParMesh *pmesh = (ParMesh *) edge_fespace->GetMesh();
00942    FiniteElementCollection *vert_fec = new LinearFECollection;
00943    ParFiniteElementSpace *vert_fespace = new ParFiniteElementSpace(pmesh, vert_fec);
00944 
00945    // generate and set the vertex coordinates
00946    ParGridFunction x_coord(vert_fespace);
00947    ParGridFunction y_coord(vert_fespace);
00948    ParGridFunction z_coord(vert_fespace);
00949    double *coord;
00950    for (int i = 0; i < pmesh->GetNV(); i++)
00951    {
00952       coord = pmesh -> GetVertex(i);
00953       x_coord(i) = coord[0];
00954       y_coord(i) = coord[1];
00955       z_coord(i) = coord[2];
00956    }
00957    x = x_coord.ParallelAverage();
00958    y = y_coord.ParallelAverage();
00959    z = z_coord.ParallelAverage();
00960    HYPRE_AMSSetCoordinateVectors(ams, *x, *y, *z);
00961 
00962    // generate and set the discrete gradient
00963    HYPRE_ParCSRMatrix Gh;
00964    {
00965       int *edge_vertex = new int[2*edge_fespace->TrueVSize()];
00966       Array<int> vert;
00967       // set orientation of locally owned edges (tdofs in edge_fespace)
00968       for (int i = 0; i < pmesh->GetNEdges(); i++)
00969       {
00970          int j = edge_fespace->GetLocalTDofNumber(i);
00971          if (j >= 0)
00972          {
00973             pmesh->GetEdgeVertices(i,vert);
00974             if (vert[0] < vert[1])
00975             {
00976                edge_vertex[2*j] = vert_fespace->GetGlobalTDofNumber(vert[0]);
00977                edge_vertex[2*j+1] = vert_fespace->GetGlobalTDofNumber(vert[1]);
00978             }
00979             else
00980             {
00981                edge_vertex[2*j] = vert_fespace->GetGlobalTDofNumber(vert[1]);
00982                edge_vertex[2*j+1] = vert_fespace->GetGlobalTDofNumber(vert[0]);
00983             }
00984          }
00985       }
00986       // fix the orientation of shared edges
00987       for (int gr = 1; gr < pmesh->GetNGroups(); gr++)
00988       {
00989          if (pmesh->groupmaster_lproc[gr] == 0)
00990             for (int j = 0; j < pmesh->GroupNEdges(gr); j++)
00991             {
00992                int k, o;
00993                pmesh->GroupEdge(gr, j, k, o);
00994                if (edge_fespace->GetDofSign(k) < 0)
00995                {
00996                   k = edge_fespace->GetLocalTDofNumber(k);
00997                   int tmp = edge_vertex[2*k];
00998                   edge_vertex[2*k] = edge_vertex[2*k+1];
00999                   edge_vertex[2*k+1] = tmp;
01000                }
01001             }
01002       }
01003       HYPRE_AMSConstructDiscreteGradient(A, *x, edge_vertex, 1, &Gh);
01004       delete edge_vertex;
01005    }
01006    G = new HypreParMatrix((hypre_ParCSRMatrix *)Gh);
01007    HYPRE_AMSSetDiscreteGradient(ams, *G);
01008 
01009    delete vert_fec;
01010    delete vert_fespace;
01011 
01012    // set additional AMS options
01013    HYPRE_AMSSetSmoothingOptions(ams, rlx_type, rlx_sweeps, rlx_weight, rlx_omega);
01014    HYPRE_AMSSetAlphaAMGOptions(ams, amg_coarsen_type, amg_agg_levels, amg_rlx_type,
01015                                theta, amg_interp_type, amg_Pmax);
01016    HYPRE_AMSSetBetaAMGOptions(ams, amg_coarsen_type, amg_agg_levels, amg_rlx_type,
01017                               theta, amg_interp_type, amg_Pmax);
01018 
01019 }
01020 
01021 HypreAMS::~HypreAMS()
01022 {
01023    HYPRE_AMSDestroy(ams);
01024 
01025    delete x;
01026    delete y;
01027    delete z;
01028 
01029    delete G;
01030 }
01031 
01032 #endif
